title: PBE signup- Check my eligibility button doesn't work?
body:
When I try to click that button, it reads: http://prntscr.com/gwoyq0

I am refreshing the page and trying again for quite a while now, but it won't do me any good. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Hey guys, the site is getting hugged to death because of the traffic.  Wait a bit, and it should be available for you once things settle down.
do you have an estimate for how long one should wait?
It seems to be improving as time goes on.  Are you able to access it now?
Porocles, is it like a queue kind of thing? Do you have to wait till your turn in line until you can access it?
No, there's no queue, though that might help.  >.<  There's just so much traffic it's causing the system to hiccup.  Patience, friend!
It still doesn't work for me {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

This is also a problem I am having. I have no bans, and I have level 5 honor. 

I keep refreshing the page andthe same message that RemarkableIdo is having.

Trust me, you are eligible. The site is, as the Rioter mentioned, being hugged to death. As in, thousands or dozens of thousands of people are trying to press that button and it's too much for the site to handle. It's probably a matter of just waiting it out
Broken for me and I've been spamming for over two hours {{item:3070}}
I believe I got lucky that I randomly clicked the button in a moment where thousands of other people weren't clicking and so it worked for me. I guess it's a matter of either patience or luck.

I'm still having problems
add on: It takes me to another screen for like 2 seconds then sends me back to the eligibility button {{item:3070}}

[](https://gyazo.com/df879ca373ad43ece2d7f88fee160c7a)
I gave you a few hours, but still no work.

Still not working for me. Sometimes it takes me to a sign up page, but it automatically takes me back to the sign up thing... O_O AD BLOCKER!!!!! FUU------- :| I am a idiot

Edit: Adblocker was not the problem. :(

Same Error EUW : Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again.

I am honor lvl 5 no ban, old account, but not working :(
